DataElement.preferredName: Sexual Health Inventory for Men 3 Past 6 Months How Often Able to Maintain Erection After Penetration During Sexual Intercourse Score 6 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how often they were able to maintain their erection after they penetrated their partner, using a 6 point scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Sexual Health Inventory for Men Past 6 Months How Often Able to Maintain Erection After Penetration During Sexual Intercourse Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research._A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present._A question about how often an individual is or was able to maintain an erection after they penetrated their partner._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research.

Concepts.definition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research.

Property.preferredName: Past 6 Months How Often Able to Maintain Erection After Penetration During Sexual Intercourse Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present.:A question about how often an individual is or was able to maintain an erection after they penetrated their partner.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present.

Concepts.longName: How Often Able to Maintain Erection After Penetration During Sexual Intercourse
Concepts.definition: A question about how often an individual is or was able to maintain an erection after they penetrated their partner.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for CCR study 17C0153 in C3D requested by P. Asangong. 8/14/17 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research._An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that sexual intercourse was not attempted.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that sexual intercourse was not attempted.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happened never or almost never.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happened never or almost never.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: A few times (much less than half the time)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: A few times (much less than half the time)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happened less than half the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happened less than half the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Most times (much more than half the time)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Most times (much more than half the time)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened most of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened most of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happened always or almost always.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happened always or almost always.
